title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather requirements, define project scope, and create a detailed product specification document.

title: Design Application Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the mobile productivity suite, including the main components and their interactions.

title: Design User Interface and Experience
description: Design the user interface and user experience for the mobile productivity suite, ensuring a seamless and intuitive workflow.

title: Design and Implement Backend Services
description: Design and implement the backend services required for the mobile productivity suite, including data storage, synchronization, and integration with third-party services.

title: Implement Mobile Application
description: Develop the mobile application for the productivity suite, integrating the user interface and backend services.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for automated building, testing, and deployment of the mobile productivity suite.

title: Implement Security and Compliance Measures
description: Implement security measures and ensure compliance with relevant regulations and industry standards for data privacy and security.

title: Create Test Suite and Conduct Quality Assurance
description: Develop a comprehensive test suite and conduct thorough quality assurance testing to ensure the mobile productivity suite meets all requirements and functions as expected.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Create technical documentation, including user guides, API documentation, and developer documentation, for the mobile productivity suite.

title: Plan and Execute Product Launch
description: Plan and execute the launch of the mobile productivity suite, including marketing, distribution, and customer support strategies.
dependencies: Create Test Suite and Conduct Quality Assurance
